message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share but I'll give you a decent starting point.
I'll start with a 50/50 split, let's see if we can do better than that!
Let's split it 70/30. I'll give you more than your last offer, and I'll still get a good deal with inflation.
I'll try to get closer to 50/50, but I'll give you a slightly smaller share than I had initially.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need at least 550000 to make this worthwhile after inflation. Let's end this game.
